explains: adj. 预言性的；成为前兆的
wordGroup: predictive coding [计]预测编码；预先编码
predictive ability 推测能力，预估能力
predictive validity 预测效度；预测有效性

sentences.en: Professor Harrison, were you saying that the periodic table is predictive?
sentences.cn: 哈里森教授，你是在说周期表是可以预测的吗？

sentences.en: Chetty has not yet issued a comprehensive analysis of the relative predictive power of each of these factors.
sentences.cn: 切蒂还没有对这些因素的相对预测能力进行全面分析。

sentences.en: It was really pretty exciting for scientists at that time to find these missing elements and confirm their predictive properties.
sentences.cn: 对当时的科学家来说，找到这些缺失的元素并证实它们被预测的特性，确实是非常令人兴奋的。
